item.title: About
item.description:
Hi! I’m Kristianto Wijaya.

I’m a Software Engineer with a passion for creating impactful software. My journey into tech has been full of growth, curiosity, and learning.

Get in Touch

If you want to connect, collaborate, or just have a chat about tech, feel free to reach me out. Iâ€™m always open to meeting new people and learning from their experiences!
